subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Water Pollution
Olympic Games (2016)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The world governing body for sailing is threatening to move events for the 2016 Rio de Janeiro Olympics out of the city’s polluted Guanabara Bay.
snippet: The world governing body for sailing is threatening to move events for the 2016 Rio de Janeiro Olympics out of the city’s polluted Guanabara Bay.
